member.name: T:RGN.Modules.GamePass.GamePassModule
member.summary: Handles the game pass related operations for the Ready Games Network (RGN) SDK.

member.name: T:RGN.Modules.GamePass.GamePassModule.Admin
member.summary: Handles critical operations for game passes

member.name: M:RGN.Modules.GamePass.GamePassModule.Admin.AddAsync(RGN.Modules.GamePass.GamePassData)
member.summary: Adds a new GamePassData to the Ready Games Network asynchronously.
member.returns: The added GamePassData object after the operation completes.

member.name: M:RGN.Modules.GamePass.GamePassModule.Admin.DeleteAsync(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Deletes a GamePassData from the Ready Games Network asynchronously based on the provided identifier or request name.
member.param: The unique identifier for the game pass to delete. Optional.
The request name associated with the game pass to delete. Optional.
member.returns: The deleted GamePassData object after the operation completes.

member.name: M:RGN.Modules.GamePass.GamePassModule.Admin.AddToUserAsync(System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Adds a game pass to a user asynchronously in the Ready Games Network.
member.param: The game pass identifier to add to the user. Optional.
The request name associated with the game pass. Optional.
The identifier of the user to whom the game pass will be added. Optional.
member.returns: The GamePassUserData object representing the user's game pass data after the operation completes.

member.name: M:RGN.Modules.GamePass.GamePassModule.Admin.DeleteFromUserAsync(System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Deletes a game pass from a user asynchronously in the Ready Games Network.
member.param: The identifier of the game pass to delete from the user. Optional.
The request name associated with the game pass. Optional.
The identifier of the user from whom the game pass will be deleted. Optional.
member.returns: A list of GamePassData objects representing the remaining game passes after the deletion.

member.name: M:RGN.Modules.GamePass.GamePassModule.GetAsync(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Retrieves a GamePassData instance asynchronously based on the provided identifier or request name.
member.param: The unique identifier for the game pass to retrieve. Optional.
The request name associated with the game pass to retrieve. Optional.

member.name: M:RGN.Modules.GamePass.GamePassModule.GetForCurrentAppAsync
member.summary: Retrieves a list of GamePassData instances for the current application asynchronously.
member.returns: A list of GamePassData associated with the current application.

member.name: M:RGN.Modules.GamePass.GamePassModule.GetForUserAsync(System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Retrieves a list of GamePassUserData instances for a user based on the provided identifier or request name.
member.param: The game pass identifier to retrieve for the user. Optional.
The request name associated with the game pass. Optional.
The identifier of the user to retrieve game passes for. Optional.
member.returns: A list of GamePassUserData instances for the specified user.

member.name: M:RGN.Modules.GamePass.GamePassModule.GetAllForUserAsync(System.String)
member.summary: Retrieves all GamePassUserData instances for a specified user asynchronously.
member.param: The identifier of the user to retrieve all game passes for. Optional.
member.returns: A list of all GamePassUserData instances for the specified user.

member.name: T:RGN.Modules.GamePass.GamePassData
member.summary: Represents a Game Pass in the Ready Games Network (RGN) with its associated properties.

member.name: F:RGN.Modules.GamePass.GamePassData.id
member.summary: Unique identifier for the Game Pass.

member.name: F:RGN.Modules.GamePass.GamePassData.appIds
member.summary: List of application identifiers that are included in this Game Pass.

member.name: F:RGN.Modules.GamePass.GamePassData.requestName
member.summary: The name used for server requests related to this Game Pass.

member.name: F:RGN.Modules.GamePass.GamePassData.name
member.summary: The display name of the Game Pass.

member.name: F:RGN.Modules.GamePass.GamePassData.description
member.summary: Detailed description of the Game Pass.

member.name: F:RGN.Modules.GamePass.GamePassData.createdAt
member.summary: The UNIX timestamp representing when the Game Pass was created. in milliseconds since midnight, January 1, 1970 UTC. Refer to for helper methods. This field is automatically populated by the backend

member.name: F:RGN.Modules.GamePass.GamePassData.updatedAt
member.summary: The UNIX timestamp representing when the Game Pass was last updated. in milliseconds since midnight, January 1, 1970 UTC. Refer to for helper methods. This field is automatically populated by the backend

member.name: F:RGN.Modules.GamePass.GamePassData.createdBy
member.summary: Identifier for the user who created the Game Pass.

member.name: F:RGN.Modules.GamePass.GamePassData.updatedBy
member.summary: Identifier for the user who last updated the Game Pass.

member.name: T:RGN.Modules.GamePass.GamePassUserData
member.summary: Represents a Game Pass in the Ready Games Network (RGN) with its associated properties.

member.name: F:RGN.Modules.GamePass.GamePassUserData.id
member.summary: Unique identifier for the Game Pass user id.

member.name: F:RGN.Modules.GamePass.GamePassUserData.gamePassId
member.summary: Unique identifier for the Game Pass.

member.name: F:RGN.Modules.GamePass.GamePassUserData.createdAt
member.summary: The UNIX timestamp representing when the Game Pass was created. in milliseconds since midnight, January 1, 1970 UTC. Refer to for helper methods. This field is automatically populated by the backend

member.name: F:RGN.Modules.GamePass.GamePassUserData.updatedAt
member.summary: The UNIX timestamp representing when the Game Pass was last updated. in milliseconds since midnight, January 1, 1970 UTC. Refer to for helper methods. This field is automatically populated by the backend

member.name: F:RGN.Modules.GamePass.GamePassUserData.createdBy
member.summary: Identifier for the user who created the Game Pass.

member.name: F:RGN.Modules.GamePass.GamePassUserData.updatedBy
member.summary: Identifier for the user who last updated the Game Pass.

member.name: T:RGN.Modules.GamePass.GetForCurrentAppResponseData
member.summary: Represents the response data received when requesting Game Pass data for the current application.

member.name: F:RGN.Modules.GamePass.GetForCurrentAppResponseData.gamePasses
member.summary: The list of GamePassData objects associated with the current application.

member.name: T:RGN.Modules.GamePass.GetGamePassUserDataResponseData
member.summary: Represents the response data received when requesting Game Pass user data.

member.name: F:RGN.Modules.GamePass.GetGamePassUserDataResponseData.gamePasses
member.summary: The list of GamePassUserData objects detailing the game passes associated with a user.
